name: Mini Golf 2018: Club Match Pro
description:
Up for the new golf challenge?
Lets download the free best golf game with “35+ Levels in 3 Episodes”.

Play the ultimate charm Mini Golf 2018, Realistic feel mini golf without overly complex game. Every age person can experience golf action game with more real and precise features than ever before.

Play The Real Sensation Of Mini Golf Game:
Mini Golf 2018 is a 3D simulation game. This adventure game offers 35+ challenging Hi-skilled levels crafted in 3 different episodes based on intensity of challenge they have. All levels and episodes are FREE, blaze your way across the realistic mini golf course to unlock next level and become world super star.

High Quality Graphics And Surroundings:
Golf course is constructed in lively and beautiful city on an island environment to bring colors to the game. It has realistic animations and sound effects that bring energy and passion to game.

Smooth Touch Controls:
• Single finger or two simple controls to hit the ball.
• Directions customizer to control the directions of the ball.
• Ball shot intensity controller for shooting in to the hole.
• Landscape game play for realistic mini golf practice.

Different Episodes To Discover Mini Golf:
• 3 episodes with 35+ challenging levels to become a champion.
• Simple to play but hard to master difficulty for legitimate challenges.

Compete With Your Friends:
• Perfect pocket mobile Mini Golf, play where you want.
• Bet and Compete with your friends and see whose the pro champion.

Be social for more:
To keep yourself update about new features and games join our social pages (facebook).
 https://www.facebook.com/bulkysports

Feedback:
If you have any suggested features or improvements please leave a comment.
